subject: Purchasing Simsonn Pedals
description_text:
Hi,

I am a little confused by your website. I am wanting to purchase a set of
pedals but can't determine which set of pedals is actually your top of the
line set. I want your actual best, top tier set......which is it exactly? A
specific name, model number and a link would be helpful.

Thank you so much for your time!

Johnny Cope

<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
Virus-free.www.avg.com
<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
<#DAB4FAD8-2DD7-40BB-A1B8-4E2AA1F9FDF2>

conversations.body_text: Hi，Johnny Cope，  ​   Both PlusX and ProX Ultra are our latest pedal models.  The ProX Ultra features 16-bit resolution, while the PlusX offers 12-bit resolution.  Additionally, the ProX Ultra comes with lighting effects and an 8-level adjustable hydraulic damper, allowing you to fine-tune it to your preference.  Both models deliver excellent mechanical structure and performance.   ​   Additionally, both models are fully compatible with the VAM Pro linear feedback motor, delivering excellent vibration feedback performance.      ​PlusX https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-plus-x-pedals?variant=51288365072698   ProX Ultra  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-sim-pedal-pro-x-ultra?variant=51308303974714     VAM Pro  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053500730

Awesome, thanks for the very quick info!

Looking now....

<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
Virus-free.www.avg.com
<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
<#DAB4FAD8-2DD7-40BB-A1B8-4E2AA1F9FDF2>

On Thu, Jul 31, 2025 at 12:17 AM service@simsonn.com

Hey, I just got the Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 with haptics off your website.
Excited to get them mounted and test them out!

<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
Virus-free.www.avg.com
<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
<#DAB4FAD8-2DD7-40BB-A1B8-4E2AA1F9FDF2>
Hi Johnny Cope,  Thank you for your support. We will arrange the shipment as soon as possible. Additionally, please note that the VAM Pro needs to be purchased separately.

Haptic Reactor Set-16-5: VAM Pro Linear Motor(2 pac/includes power supply)
| $115.90

That correct? Yes, I bought that as well! I may buy a shifter too...haven't
decided yet. Do you know if your wheels are compatible with Simagic Direct
Drive wheel bases?

<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
Virus-free.www.avg.com
<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
<#DAB4FAD8-2DD7-40BB-A1B8-4E2AA1F9FDF2>

On Thu, Jul 31, 2025 at 3:10 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Johnny Cope,  Our quick-release wheel uses a 70mm bolt pattern, while the Simagic base typically uses a 55mm bolt pattern. To connect them, you may need an additional adapter. At present, we do not provide such adapter parts.

Hey, what's the deal with all the reviews on Amazon about the spring in
your shifter failing so quickly? I was really wanting to get it...are y'all
addressing the problem?

https://www.amazon.com/SIMSONN-Shifter-Simulator-Sequential-High-precision-PC/dp/B0DTTRCLZW/ref=asc_df_B0DTTRCLZW?tag=bingshoppinga-20&linkCode=df0&hvadid=80401986666379&hvnetw=o&hvqmt=e&hvbmt=be&hvdev=c&hvlocint=&hvlocphy=74908&hvtargid=pla-4584001449248193&msclkid=ebb3d8dd090c14597617b050af4e15ad&th=1

On Thu, Jul 31, 2025 at 7:39 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Johnny Cope,  We will soon be upgrading the sequential shifter module, improving its design from a helical structure to a dual-spring structure, which will greatly enhance both feel and durability.

Ok, that sounds great. Any idea of when that will be because, I am really
wanting to get your shifter to match my pedals!

On Tue, Aug 5, 2025 at 8:06 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Johnny Cope,  It’s expected to be around the end of the month.

Hey! Just checking the status of the upgraded shifter. How is it going?

On Wed, Aug 6, 2025 at 9:09 AM service@simsonn.com

Just checking the status of the upgraded shifter again. How is it going?

<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
Virus-free.www.avg.com
<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
<#DAB4FAD8-2DD7-40BB-A1B8-4E2AA1F9FDF2>
你好，Johnny Cope，  我们仍在测试新序列文件的性能。请您再等待几天。

Black Friday!! What's the word on that shifter?

<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
